# toluna_invoke_lambda (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `rule_set` (Block)
  - key_name (String)
  - rule (String)
  - value (String)
- `json_config` (Map)


### Optional


## Example Usage

```terraform

terraform {
  required_providers {
    toluna = {
      source = "toluna-terraform/toluna"
      version = ">=0.0.9"
    }
  }
}

provider "aws" {
  region  = "us-east-1"
  profile = "my-profile"
}

provider "toluna" {
  
}

data "toluna_validate_configuration" "example" {
  rule_set {
    key_name = "key"
    rule ="unique"
    value = "nil" 
  }
  rule_set {
    key_name = "$..env_index"
    rule ="odd"
    value = "nil" 
  }
  rule_set {
    key_name = "$..env_index"
    rule =">"
    value = "6" 
  }
  rule_set {
    key_name = "$..env_index"
    rule ="<"
    value = "21" 
  }
  rule_set {
    key_name = "key"
    rule ="~="
    value = "example" 
  }
  json_config = data.consul_keys.appjson.var
} 
```
